original_text: O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, thou that killest the prophets, and stonest them which are sent unto thee, how often would I have gathered thy children together, even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings, and ye would not!
korean_text: 예루살렘아 예루살렘아 선지자들을 죽이고 네게 파송된 자들을 돌로 치는 자여 암탉이 그 새끼를 날개 아래에 모음 같이 내가 네 자녀를 모으려 한 일이 몇 번이더냐 그러나 너희가 원하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: and stonest them which are sent unto thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네게 보냄을 받은 자들을 돌로 치는구나

sentences.original_text: how often would I have gathered thy children together
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 얼마나 자주 네 자녀들을 모으려 하였던가

sentences.original_text: even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings
